column1: Little Goat Diner////There are enough reviews on the nachos and pork belly pancake
column2: but the crumpets and quesadilla don't get enough attention! The crumpets come with some kind of citrus fruit
column4: and is topped with syrup! It sounds strange
column5: but is the perfect sweet and salty and acidic combo. I wish they would bring it back. Veggie quesadilla is so creative and is perfect if you love goat cheese. I don't like vegetarian options so I never get veggie things
